H1.text: what did stephen hawking study. Astronomy

H2.text: what did stephen hawking study. Computer Science

H3.text: what did stephen hawking study. Physics

A4.text: In October 1959, at the age of 17, he began his university education at University College, Oxford, where he received a first-class BA degree in physics.

A5.text: As it was not possible to read mathematics there at the time, Hawking decided to study physics and chemistry.
